metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4517 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Apache Santuario XML Security for Java before 1.5.6, when applyingTransforms, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) via crafted Document Type Definitions (DTDs), related tosignatures.

criterions.comment: libxml-security-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
